[E037] Error: property `Foo::$s` cannot have type `string|int|callable`
   ,-[code.php:4:12]
   |
 3 | class Foo {
   *       ^^^  
   *             
 4 |     public string|int|callable $s;
   *            ^^^^^^^^^|^^^^^^^^^ ^^  
   *                     |               
   *                     |              
   *                     `-------------- try using a different type
   * 
   * Note: `void`, `never`, and `callable` types are not allowed in properties and constants
---'
